description:
Writes record-wise information from Genbank files into tab-separated or html tables
Takes a genbank file which has been annotated using Domainate, write tabulated descriptions of each contig, CDS, or domain.

parameters.name: Input
parameters.help: GenBank or FASTA filenames.

parameters.name: Output
parameters.help: The name of the output tsv file.

parameters.name: Html
parameters.help: Write a table in html format to this file.

parameters.name: By
parameters.help: One line in output for every by contig, cds or domain. For protein genbanks, contig and cds are treated the same. default: by contig

parameters.name: Databases
parameters.help: Ignore domain annotations not from these databases. default: consider all databases.

parameters.name: Domains
parameters.help: report domain content as alphabetical and semicolon-separated, only listing duplicates once.

parameters.name: Domain Descriptions
parameters.help: report domain content as alphabetical and semicolon-separated, only listing duplicates once.

parameters.name: Score
parameters.help: report report the sum of domain scores.

parameters.name: Identity
parameters.help: report report the sum of domain identities.

parameters.name: Architecture
parameters.help: report domains in order of appearance of start position in the sequence and semicolon-separated.

parameters.name: Architecture Detailed
parameters.help: report domain architecture in order of appearance of start position in the sequence. Within each CDS, domains are separated by a '/'. CDSs are separated by a ';'. CDSs with no domains are represented by 'no_domains'.

parameters.name: Start
parameters.help: report the start coordinate of the feature.

parameters.name: End
parameters.help: report the end coordinate of the feature.

parameters.name: Strand
parameters.help: report the strand of the feature.

parameters.name: Length
parameters.help: report the (contig, cds, or domain) length as a column in the output.

parameters.name: Topology
parameters.help: report the topology in the output (typically only makes sense when using --by contig).

parameters.name: Sequence
parameters.help: report the (contig, cds, or domain) sequence as a column in the output.

parameters.name: Cds Count
parameters.help: report the number of CDSs as a column in the output

parameters.name: Domain Count
parameters.help: report the number of domains as a column in the output

parameters.name: Definition
parameters.help: report sequence definition line from the genbank file.

parameters.name: Filename
parameters.help: report the filename of the input file from which the record originated.

parameters.name: Domain Search
parameters.help: This is a composite metric that will return multiple columns: best_query, query_description, query_start, query_end, query_length, match_start, match_end, match_strand, match_score, match_identity.

parameters.name: Taxid Lineage
parameters.help: a semicolon separated list of taxids from the root to the taxid of the sequence.

parameters.name: Taxname Lineage
parameters.help: a semicolon separated list of taxnames from the root to the taxid of the sequence.

parameters.name: Rank Lineage
parameters.help: a semicolon separated list of ranks from the root to the taxid of the sequence.

parameters.name: Taxid
parameters.help: The taxid at the given rank (e.g. superkingdom, genus, species); use 'self' for the lowest level taxid available for the record. Enter one entry per line; within a line, provide one or more ranks separated by spaces or commas. The column will be named taxid_[rank].

parameters.name: Taxname
parameters.help: The taxname at the given rank (e.g. superkingdom, genus, species); use 'self' for the lowest level taxname available for the record. Enter one entry per line; within a line, provide one or more ranks separated by spaces or commas. The column will be named taxname_[rank].

parameters.name: Qualifier
parameters.help: Supply two strings: a feature type and a qualifier name. Report the values of all instances of this feature+qualifier combination (multiple hits are joined with ';'). Enter one entry per line; within a line provide exactly two values separated by spaces or a comma.

parameters.name: Feature Count
parameters.help: Reports the number of features of this type. Enter one entry per line.

parameters.name: Motif Count
parameters.help: Report the number of the given PROSITE motif present in the sequence. If nucleotide sequences are provided, then nucleotide motifs are counted. If protein sequences are provided, then protein motifs are counted. More information about PROSITE specification can be found: https://emboss.sourceforge.net/apps/release/6.5/emboss/apps/fuzzpro.html. Enter one entry per line.

parameters.name: Isoelectric Point
parameters.help: Report the isoelectric point of a protein. Only defined for contigs with exactly 1 protein sequence (either a nucleic acid contig with 1 CDS, or a protein contig).

parameters.name: Net Charge
parameters.help: Report the net charge of a protein at the given pH. Only defined for contigs with exactly 1 protein sequence (either a nucleic acid contig with 1 CDS, or a protein contig). Enter one entry per line.

parameters.name: Repeat Count
parameters.help: Report the number of repeats of the given length or longer. For example AGGKKK will have repeat_count_1 = 3, repeat_count_2 = 2, and repeat_count_3 = 1. Enter one entry per line.

parameters.name: Named Domain Count
parameters.help: Count the number of Domainator domain features with the given domain name. Can be supplied multiple times. Enter one domain name per line.

parameters.name: Starts With
parameters.help: Reports the first character of the contig sequence.

parameters.name: Molecular Weight
parameters.help: Reports the molecular weight (in Daltons) of the sequence. Automatically uses the correct calculation for protein, DNA, or RNA based on the molecule_type annotation.

advanced_parameters.name: Html Max Height
advanced_parameters.help: Max height in pixels to set the html output to.

advanced_parameters.name: Contigs
advanced_parameters.help: only examine contigs with ids in this list. Additive with --contigs_file. default: all contigs.

advanced_parameters.name: Contigs File
advanced_parameters.help: only examine contigs with ids listed in this file (one per line). Additive with --contigs. default: all contigs.

advanced_parameters.name: Column Names
advanced_parameters.help: If supplied, then this list will be used instead of the default column names.

advanced_parameters.name: Append
advanced_parameters.help: Supply three strings: column name, column type (str/int/float), and a constant value for all rows. Enter one entry per line; within a line provide exactly three values separated by spaces or commas.

advanced_parameters.name: Taxonomy Update
advanced_parameters.help: If taxonomy database exists, check it against the version on the ncbi server and update if there is a newer version.

advanced_parameters.name: Ncbi Taxonomy Path
advanced_parameters.help: Path to NCBI taxonomy database directory. Will be created and downloaded if it does not exist.
